content.rendered:
[vc_section][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”1538″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Specials

Discover Melbourne’s outer east!

The hotel is ideally located at the gateway to some of Victoria’s most visited tourist destinations; the Yarra Valley, Dandenong Ranges and Mornington Peninsula. Guests enjoy being a hop, skip and jump from all Victoria has to offer including easy access to Melbourne CBD and Melbourne Airport.

The Canterbury International Hotel is the perfect pitstop for any domestic or international traveller wanting to see it all. Beautifully designed, this independent boutique hotel represents the sophisticated blend of old meets new. With an unexpected elegance and style, guests love the warm and inviting environment that is the perfect getaway!

A great excuse to spoil your special someone!

To take advantage of these exclusive accommodation value packages simply call +61 3 9878 4111.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
